# <span style="color:orange">What we learned </span>

<span style="color:blue">Some programming best practices</span>

* documentation

* modular programming

* testing as you go (with sample datasets) and automated testing

* always start with a diagram/flow chart - break your task into modules with inputs/parameters and outputs
 
# <span style="color:orange">What we learned </span>
 
<span style="color:blue">Key Programming Concepts</span>

* building functions

* generating and storing data; data structures

* repeating/looping - general and R specific

* flow control (if, case statement)

* sharing code with others
  * git - for other developers
  * packages - for your clients
